name: Drawable
description:
Disclaimer

A group project developed in 10 weeks for Project II class.

Drawable is a puzzle platformer game with a mechanic of drawing.

Story

You are an artist, whose teacher was captured by his worst enemy. She is a real villain,  she draws horrible sketches and turns them into enemies. 

Help your teacher and save the world, before she turns into a black and white sketch...

Developers:

 Ricard Ruiz - Lead Programmer
